Title: Repeals section 1020-dd of the public authorities law, relating to the prohibition of acceptance by the Long Island power authority of preference hydroelectricity
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the prohibition of acceptance by the Long Island power authority of preference hydroelectricity.

ActClause: AN ACT to repeal section 1020-dd of the public authorities law, relating to the prohibition of acceptance by the Long Island power authority of preference hydroelectricity
